reviews.review:
For casuals like me:

After 400+ hours I can say for sure

The game isn't perfect-there are still some fixes that need to be made.

Still, it's a fun game with friends if you don't take it too seriously. 

The most addictive part is the ridiculously high skill ceiling- just watch pros play compared to other players with 2k+ hours- it's an achievement to be called "good" let alone get to the top 3 ranks. 

It makes every milestone all the more rewarding.

7/10
My team suicided in front of enemy, missed all shots and stood afk in base. The one fucking time i try to throw flame grenade, my team runs into it and i get kicked for 7 days. Thank you, Blizzard.
